(ROOT
  (SBAR
    (WHADVP (WRB When))
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (ADVP (RB first))
      (VP (VBD wrote)
        (PP (IN about)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NNP Vera) (NNP Pizza) (NNP Napoletana))
            (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
              (NP (NNP VPN))
              (-RRB- -RRB-))))
        (S
          (VP (VBG certification)
            (PRT (RP back))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (CD 2009)))
            (, ,)))))))

nsubj(wrote-4, I-2)
advmod(wrote-4, first-3)
root(ROOT-0, wrote-4)
prep(wrote-4, about-5)

nn(Napoletana-9, Vera-7)

prt(certification-13, back-14)
prep(certification-13, in-15)
pobj(in-15, 2009-16)

                (NP (DT a) (NNP VPN) (JJ certified) (NN pizza))

    (. .)))

  (S
    (S
      (NP (DT the) (NN pizza))

          (VP (TO to)

                                (-RRB- -RRB-)))))))))))))))

              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB produce)
                  (NP (DT a) (JJ kickbutt) (NNP VPN) (NN pizza))
                  (SBAR
                    (SBAR (IN so)
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP I))
                        (VP (VBP think)
                          (SBAR
                            (S
                              (NP (PRP we))
                              (VP (VBP have)
                                (NP (DT a) (NN lot)
                                  (S
                                    (VP (TO to)
                                      (VP (VB look)
                                        (ADVP (RB forward))
                                        (PP (TO to))))))))))))
                    (CC and)
                    (SBAR (IN as)
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP they))
                        (VP (VBP say))))))))))))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NNS pizzas))
      (PP (IN at)
        (NP (NNP L'Operetta))))
    (VP (VBP are) (RB all)
      (VP (VBN priced)
        (PP (IN between)
          (NP (NNP $)))))))


det(pizzas-2, The-1)
nsubjpass(priced-7, pizzas-2)
prep(pizzas-2, at-3)
pobj(at-3, L'Operetta-4)
auxpass(priced-7, are-5)
advmod(priced-7, all-6)
root(ROOT-0, priced-7)
prep(priced-7, between-8)
pobj(between-8, $-9)

(ROOT
  (S (IN so)
    (NP (DT the) (NNS prices))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (ADJP (RB surprisingly) (JJ affordable))
      (PP (VBN given)
        (NP
          (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (NN effort))
          (PP (IN of)
            (S
              (VP
                (VP (VBG procuring)
                  (NP (DT a) (JJ true) (NNP Napoli) (NN oven)))
                (CC and)
                (VP (VBG using)
                  (NP (JJ real) (NN wood))
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB fire)
                        (NP (PRP it))))))))))))
    (. !)))

amod(oven-16, true-14)
nn(oven-16, Napoli-15)

(ROOT
  (NP (NNP Haha) (NNP ,)))


nn(,-2, Haha-1)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP
      (ADVP (RB so) (RB quirky))
      (CC and)
      (ADVP (RB definitely)))
    (NP (RB very) (JJ Japanese))
    (. !)))


advmod(quirky-2, so-1)
dep(Japanese-6, quirky-2)
cc(quirky-2, and-3)
conj(quirky-2, definitely-4)
advmod(Japanese-6, very-5)
root(ROOT-0, Japanese-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP hope)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (ADVP (DT all))
          (VP (VBP have)
            (NP (NN fun))
            (PP (IN with)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NNS guys))
                (PP (IN at)
                  (NP (NNP L'Operetta)))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(hope-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, hope-2)
nsubj(have-5, you-3)
advmod(have-5, all-4)
ccomp(hope-2, have-5)
dobj(have-5, fun-6)
prep(have-5, with-7)
det(guys-9, the-8)
pobj(with-7, guys-9)
prep(guys-9, at-10)
pobj(at-10, L'Operetta-11)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (X
      (NP
        (NP (NNP -RRB-) (NNP L'Operetta))
        (NP
          (NP (CD 78,79))
          (NP (NNP Boat) (NNP Quay)
            (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
              (ADJP (JJ furthest)
                (PP (IN from)
                  (NP (DT the) (NNP UOB) (NNP Plaza))))
              (-RRB- -RRB-))
            (NNP Singapore))))
      (NP (CD 049866))
      (NP
        (NP (NNP 64382482) (NNP Open))
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP (NN lunch)
            (CC and)
            (NN dinner)))))
    (NP (JJ daily) (NNP View) (NNP Larger) (NNP Map))))


dep(Open-16, L'Operetta-2)
dep(L'Operetta-2, 78,79-3)
nn(Singapore-13, Boat-4)
nn(Singapore-13, Quay-5)
dep(Singapore-13, furthest-7)
prep(furthest-7, from-8)
det(Plaza-11, the-9)
nn(Plaza-11, UOB-10)
pobj(from-8, Plaza-11)
dep(78,79-3, Singapore-13)
dep(Open-16, 049866-14)
nn(Open-16, 64382482-15)
dep(Map-24, Open-16)
prep(Open-16, for-17)
pobj(for-17, lunch-18)
cc(lunch-18, and-19)
conj(lunch-18, dinner-20)
amod(Map-24, daily-21)
nn(Map-24, View-22)
nn(Map-24, Larger-23)
root(ROOT-0, Map-24)
